Shoegaming with Proteus

23 Mar 2014

Proteus is an open world exploration game with procedurally generated environments and environment-generated music. Last January, I recorded a Proteus session with the audio routed through a series of effects pedals. I rediscovered the video today, and realized the experience is not unlike Polyfauna.

Polyfauna

Distorted Proteus


If you want to get your shoegame on with Proteus, this was my effects chain:

Proteus > MXR carbon copy > Boss RV-5 > keeley rat > out

If you don't have any effects pedals, you can route your system audio via Soundflower to any DAW (Ableton Live, Garage Band, etc.).

Happy shoegaming!
